version_description: Improved app's stability and corrected a few minor mistakes.
Improved app's stability and corrected a few minor mistakes.
Hunted down and fixed a few bugs that you reported. We'll continue reading your feedback.
Hunted down and fixed a few bugs that you reported. We'll continue reading your feedback.
The card information section now includes banking details (for physical cards too). You can copy card number and CVC/CVV in the app and share the details via email or text message in a few seconds.
The card information section now includes banking details (for physical cards too). You can copy card number and CVC/CVV in the app and share the details via email or text message in a few seconds.
Improved app's stability and corrected a few minor mistakes.
Improved app's stability and corrected a few minor mistakes.
Improved app's stability and corrected a few minor mistakes.
Improved app's stability and corrected a few minor mistakes.

We have 2 pieces of good news:
— The new widgets make it easier to track your balance, payment history, etc. without opening the app.
— If you have ordered a YooMoney card, you can track its journey in the app: from the moment you ordered it to the delivery to the post office (or the moment it's picked up by the courier).

We have 2 pieces of good news:
— The new widgets make it easier to track your balance, payment history, etc. without opening the app.
— If you have ordered a YooMoney card, you can track its journey in the app: from the moment you ordered it to the delivery to the post office (or the moment it's picked up by the courier).
Improved stability and fixed a few minor bugs.
Improved stability and fixed a few minor bugs.

An update with a hope for future travels: now you can activate multicurrency support (free for the first month) when you're ordering the card, then pay abroad in the required currency without commission. You can also simply open currency accounts in the wallet: this option is always free and available.

An update with a hope for future travels: now you can activate multicurrency support (free for the first month) when you're ordering the card, then pay abroad in the required currency without commission. You can also simply open currency accounts in the wallet: this option is always free and available.

You can now sign in via Apple ID.
To be able to sign in without entering password, go to Personal information under your account and link Apple ID to your wallet.

You can now sign in via Apple ID.
To be able to sign in without entering password, go to Personal information under your account and link Apple ID to your wallet.

Updated the cashback screen: now it's clearer how bonus points work in YooMoney.

The first option is cashback in certain categories: 5% of purchases in categories of the month is returned in bonus points. You also get 1% back for online purchases and 5% for every fifth offline purchase.

Alternatively, you can select random cashback and get up to a 100% cashback bonus for one random payment.

Whichever option you choose, you can also earn bonus points in our partners' stores.

Updated the cashback screen: now it's clearer how bonus points work in YooMoney.

The first option is cashback in certain categories: 5% of purchases in categories of the month is returned in bonus points. You also get 1% back for online purchases and 5% for every fifth offline purchase.

Alternatively, you can select random cashback and get up to a 100% cashback bonus for one random payment.

Whichever option you choose, you can also earn bonus points in our partners' stores.
Fixed a few minor bugs.
Fixed a few minor bugs.
Added dark theme (Yay!). The app will switch to it automatically if you have dark mode selected in your phone or tablet settings.
Added dark theme (Yay!). The app will switch to it automatically if you have dark mode selected in your phone or tablet settings.
